title: anotherpedia:editsilentpage-drat
text: Drat#$$$#<<shortExpression of minor annoyanceshort>><<img(src=git/drat.gif(cap=[[Snapping|Snap]] or making a short motion with the arm is often done in conjecture with saying drat.img>>{{bDrat}} is an [[expression]] used to display [[annoyance]] to a minor degree. {{iDrats!}} is the [[exclamation]] of drat. {{bBeans.}}#$$$#2023-09-16#$$$#Warm_Wooly
